data.partBlankContent: Jen likes sandwiches with tomato and butter. She ea__ them f__ lunch ev___ day a_ school, and some_____ for din___ too. Her fat___ makes h__ other sandw_____ sometimes. But Jen does n__ eat th__. She does not want to eat anything new.
data.fullContent: Jen likes sandwiches with tomato and butter. She eats them for lunch every day at school, and sometimes for dinner too. Her father makes her other sandwiches sometimes. But Jen does not eat them. She does not want to eat anything new.
data.answer: 珍喜欢加番茄和黄油的三明治。她每天在学校吃午饭，有时也吃晚饭。她爸爸有时给她做其他三明治。但是珍不吃它们。她不想吃任何新东西。
